summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1868, for the improvement of East Jefferson Street, in the City of Seattle, from Twentieth Avenue to a point one hundred six (106) feet east of Twenty-third Avenue, by constructing concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 19514, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
